title: Braised fennel with butter and parmesan
description: This is a fabulous fennel recipe – it’s great with roast lamb or can be eaten as a vegetarian dish on its own.
ingredients: 750g/1½lb fennel bulbs, trimmed, halved, trimmings reserved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
splash pastis (optional, alternatively add more dry vermouth)
60g/2oz parmesan (or similar vegetarian hard cheese), grated, plus extra for serving
